devDependenciesComments.eslint-config-prettier: disable the rules that interfere with prettier
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-prettier: run prettier as an eslint rule.  See https://github.com/prettier/eslint-plugin-prettier#recommended-configuration for reference
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-react: added by `eslint --init` when I said my project uses react
